thread.title: MB
thread.title_full: Antique Lamp Supply reviewed by MB

author: MB
title: MB
text: I placed an order for my father. He later called about needing an additional order. The woman was able to look up the order I placed by my name. She even gave my father my password to my account on their site. Absolutely unacceptable! Luckily I trust my dad, but who knows who else she has given others information to!
